body_html:
@mrry It looks from the code that this would be difficult to do since tf.gradient_override_map is a Python construct and (presumably) doesn't have an easy way to validate the args against all registered op names?

FWIW, the documentation here, does show a clear example where the name of the op whose gradient is being overridden is capitalized whilst the python op wrapper uses the PEP11 naming convention.

It's also still labelled as EXPERIMENTAL in the docs ... Is this still the case, or is it part of the TF1.0 API?
